title: far as it relates to Articles 6(1)(b), (1)(c) and (2)(m) thereof, hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Business Expenditure on
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Business Expenditure on 

Research and Development Survey) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (business expenditure research development survey) order 2024

title: far as it relates to Articles 6(1)(b), (1)(c) and (2)(m) thereof, hereby order as
heading: 2. (1) In this Order -
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order - 

“R&D” means research and development; 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 27 November 20191, as amended by Commission 
Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20212; 

“survey” means the Business Expenditure on Research and Development 
Survey that is conducted by the Central Statistics Office in order to obtain 
information on R&D, including for the purpose of compliance with the 
Regulation. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, except 
where the context otherwise requires.
text_norm: 2 (1) order - r mean research development regulation mean regulation (eu) 2019 2152 european parliament council 27 november 20191 amended commission delegated regulation (eu) 2021 1704 14 july 20212 survey mean business expenditure research development survey conducted central statistic office order obtain information r including purpose compliance regulation (2) word expression used order also used regulation meaning order regulation except context otherwise requires

title: far as it relates to Articles 6(1)(b), (1)(c) and (2)(m) thereof, hereby order as
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical 
purposes under any section of NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex I to Regulation 
(EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 
December 20063, as amended by Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 20084, Regulation (EU) 
No. 70/2012 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 
20125 and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 20 June 2019.6 

1 OJ No. L 327, 17.12.2019, p.1. 
2 OJ No. L 339, 24.9.2021, p.33. 
3 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p.1. 
4 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p.13. 
5 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p.1. 
6 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p.241. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide, 
once only and for the purposes of the survey, information the general nature of 
which is specified in the Schedule, is hereby prescribed. 

[190] 3 

 
 
 
 4 [190]

title: far as it relates to Articles 6(1)(b), (1)(c) and (2)(m) thereof, hereby order as
heading: Article 4

title: far as it relates to Articles 6(1)(b), (1)(c) and (2)(m) thereof, hereby order as
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the undertaking
text_raw:
1. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to the undertaking 

concerned: 

(a) 

the nature of its business activity in so far as it relates to R&D in 
2023; 

(b) 

expenditure on in-house R&D activity in 2023; 

(c) 

(d) 

(e) 

(f) 

estimated expenditure on in-house R&D activity in 2024; 

sources of funds for in-house R&D activity performed in 2023 
and the amount in euro from each source concerned; 

categories of in-house R&D activity performed in 2023 and the 
expenditure on each category concerned; 

the number of persons involved in in-house R&D activity in 
2023 including the roles, qualifications and gender of such 
persons and the amount of time spent by such persons on that 
activity; 

(g) R&D activity at local unit level in 2023; 

(h) 

(i) 

expenditure on R&D activity performed on behalf of the 
undertaking by other persons in 2023; 

by reference to the qualifications of the persons concerned, 
whether the undertaking is likely, in the period commencing on 
1 January 2024 and ending on 31 December 2029, to increase 
the number of persons involved in in-house R&D activity; 

(j) 

engagement in 2023 by the undertaking with other persons in 
joint R&D projects.
text_norm: 1 information regarding following relates undertaking concerned (a) nature business activity far relates r 2023 (b) expenditure in-house r activity 2023 (c) (d) (e) (f) estimated expenditure in-house r activity 2024 source fund in-house r activity performed 2023 amount euro source concerned category in-house r activity performed 2023 expenditure category concerned number person involved in-house r activity 2023 including role qualification gender person amount time spent person activity (g) r activity local unit level 2023 (h) (i) expenditure r activity performed behalf undertaking person 2023 reference qualification person concerned whether undertaking likely period commencing 1 january 2024 ending 31 december 2029 increase number person involved in-house r activity (j) engagement 2023 undertaking person joint r project

title: far as it relates to Articles 6(1)(b), (1)(c) and (2)(m) thereof, hereby order as
heading: Information regarding the time taken by the undertaking concerned to
text_raw:
2. 

Information regarding the time taken by the undertaking concerned to 
complete the form, questionnaire or other record prepared by the Director 
General for the collection of information referred to in paragraph 1. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

2 May, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach.
